seriesJson.title: Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra
seriesJson.description: This series presents performances by the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra from its 1963 season.

node.title: Bartok's Piano Concerto, No. 3
node.description: A performance by pianist Peter Serkin and conductor Max Rudolf, along with the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra, of Bela Bartok's Piano Concerto, No. 3.

node.title: Papaioannou, Prokofieff, Busoni, and Bruch, part 4
node.description: This program, part four of four, features performances of compositions from Papaioannou, Prokofieff, Busoni, and Bruch. Violinist Isaac Stern is the featured guest.

node.title: Papaioannou, Prokofieff, Busoni, and Bruch, part 2
node.description: This program, part two of four, features performances of compositions from Papaioannou, Prokofieff, Busoni, and Bruch. Violinist Isaac Stern is the featured guest.

node.title: Bach, Bartok, and Brahms, part 3
node.description: This program, the first of five parts, features performances of pieces by Bach, Bartok, and Brahms. Pianist Sidney Foster is the guest performer.

node.title: Beethoven, part 4
node.description: This program, the fourth of four parts, features the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra joined by pianist Claudio Arrau; and the College-Conservatory Chorus of the University of Cincinnati. Selections composed by Beethoven are performed.

node.title: Beethoven, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of four parts, features the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra joined by pianist Claudio Arrau; and the College-Conservatory Chorus of the University of Cincinnati. Selections composed by Beethoven are performed.

node.title: Bach, Bartok, and Brahms, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of five parts, features the University of Cincinnati College-Conservatory Chorus performing with the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra. Selections by Bach, Bartok, and Brahms are performed.

node.title: Mendelssohn, Strauss, and Sibelius, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of five parts, features performances of pieces by Mendelssohn, Strauss and Sibelius. Featuring Edith Peinemann, violin; and Erich Kunzel, conductor.

node.description: Mendelssohn, Strauss and Sibelius. Featuring Edith Peinemann, violin; Erich Kunzel, conductor.

node.title: Weber, Creston, Ravel, and Rachmaninoff, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of four parts, features performances of pieces by Weber, Creston, Ravel, and Rachmaninoff.

node.description: This program, the third of four parts, features performances of pieces by Weber, Creston, Ravel, and Rachmaninoff.

node.title: Stravinsky
node.description: This program features a performance of Igor Stravinsky's "Rites Of Spring."

node.title: Symphonic concert
node.description: The program presents the performance of an unidentified piece by the Cincinnati Symphony.

node.title: Weber, Takacs, and Berlioz
node.description: This program features performances of pieces by Carl Maria von Weber, Jeno Takacs, and Hector Berlioz.

node.title: Mozart
node.description: Roberta Peters performs a piece by Mozart.

node.title: Audition tape
node.description: Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra audition tape, recorded at 1963 rehearsal with permission of Musicians' Association, not for broadcast. This program contains portions of Kodaly Symphony and last movement of Beethoven Concerto No. 1.

node.title: Donizetti and Ravel
node.description: Roberta Peters performs a piece by Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Ravel.

node.title: Mozart, Delius, Verdi, and Donizetti
node.description: Roberta Peters performs pieces by Mozart, Verdi and Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Delius.

node.title: Mozart, Delius, Verdi, and Donizetti
node.description: Roberta Peters performs pieces by Mozart, Verdi and Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Delius.

node.title: Foss and Stravinsky
node.description: This program features Lukas Foss speaking, as well as a performance of Igor Stravinsky's "Rites Of Spring."

node.title: Smetana and Schumann
node.description: This program features performances of pieces by Bedrich Smetana and Robert Schumann.

node.title: Smetana and Schumann
node.description: This program features performances of pieces by Bedrich Smetana and Robert Schumann.

node.title: Tchaikovsky
node.description: This program features a performance of a piece by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky.

node.title: Beethoven and Foss
node.description: This program features performances of pieces by Ludwig van Beethoven and Lukas Foss.

node.title: Symphonic concert
node.description: The program presents the performance of an unidentified piece by the Cincinnati Symphony.

node.title: Schumann and Mozart
node.description: This program features performances of pieces by Robert Schumann and Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

node.title: Weber, Creston, Ravel, and Rachmaninoff, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of four parts, features performances of pieces by Weber, Creston, Ravel, and Rachmaninoff.
